fields.name: Výroba plastových výlisků a pryže
fields.description: This database of companies operating in the plastics industry offers a comprehensive overview of suppliers of plastic components and tools for plastics manufacturing (PE, PA, PP, ABS, POM, etc.) in the Czech Republic. Companies are categorised according to utilised technologies (injection moulding, blow moulding, extrusion, surface treatment etc.). The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Energetika
fields.description: The database gives comprehensive overview of suppliers active in the producing of technologies and power-generation equipment which is used in Solar, Wind, Hydro, Nuclear, Biomass, Gas steam, Oil and coal power. The database also includes companies which are producing components and equipment for the transmission and storage of energy. The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Materiály a obaly
fields.description: This database makes it possible to search for suppliers of basic and raw materials for other branches of industry (ferrous and non-ferrous metals – sections, rods, wire, tubing – wood, glass, etc.) and companies in the chemical industry in the Czech Republic. The database also includes producers of packaging (EP and EPS filling, foil, plastic and paper packaging). The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolios, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Letecký průmysl
fields.description: The database of companies operating in the aerospace industry provides an exhaustive overview of manufacturers in this sector in the Czech Republic and allows simple, logical searching for aerospace-industry partners and suppliers according to their main areas of activity; aerospace modules from structural and engine components of aircraft, interior equipment and systems to final aircraft assembly. The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Strojírenství
fields.description: This database provides a comprehensive overview of producers and suppliers in the engineering industry in the Czech Republic. Companies are logically categorised according to their respective activities (producers of machine tools and shaping machines, transportation and handling equipment, hydraulic elements, automation, power-generation equipment, metallurgy, robotics). The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Zdravotnická technika, biotechnologie a farmaceutický průmysl
fields.description: This database includes manufacturers of healthcare materials, healthcare technology (imaging and diagnostic instruments, laboratory equipment, computer technology), producers of pharmaceutical products and companies operating in the areas of biotechnology and R&D. The database also contains manufacturers of metal components and plastic products for the healthcare industry. The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Zpracování kovů
fields.description: This database of companies in the metallurgy industry enables comprehensive searching for metal producers and suppliers in the Czech Republic. Companies are clearly categorised according to the technologies they use (pressing, forging, casting, machining, cutting, welding) as well as by their main activities (tool suppliers, surface preparation, etc). The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolios, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Elektronika a elektrotechnika
fields.description: The database of companies in the electronics and electrical-engineering industry provides an exhaustive overview of manufacturers in this sector in the Czech Republic. Companies are logically categorised according to their activities, such as computer-components manufacturing, telecommunications, measuring devices, sensors, radio and display technologies, connection accessories, plastic and metal components, and PCB assembly. The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: ICT Informační a komunikační technologie
fields.description: The ICT database includes firms engaged in development and administration of information and communication technologies, support and related services, outsourcing, software development, network installation and administration, provision of systems solutions and integration, graphics and animation, education, etc. The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.

fields.name: Automobilový průmysl
fields.description: The database of companies in the automotive industry covers the full supplier sector in the Czech Republic and provides transparent and unique means of searching for partners and suppliers in the automotive industry by their placement in the supply chain according to Tiers 1, 2, 3; automotive modules ranging from individual engine parts and drive-train components, brakes and exhaust systems to body components, electronics systems and interior equipment. The basic scope of information covers contact information, product portfolio, customer references and quality certificates.
